problem.p: Consider a delegation event model for a mouse click event. The mouseClicked(MouseEvent e) is a method defined in ________.

choicegroup.label: week8gpt2input1
choicegroup.choice: both the event source class and the event listener class
both the event object class and the event listener class

div.p: Methods for handling an event are defined in the event listener class. For a mouse click event, the mouseClicked() method is defined in the listener class which implemented the MouseListener interface.
